title: Fourteen Hours ( 1951, USA) Featuring Richard Basehart, Paul Douglas Film Noir Full Movie.mp 4

sources.title: Fourteen Hours ( 1951, USA) Featuring Richard Basehart, Paul Douglas Film Noir Full Movie.mp 4
sources.description: Fourteen Hours is a 1951 American drama directed by Henry Hathaway that tells the story of a New York City police officer trying to stop a despondent man from jumping to his death from the 15th floor of a hotel.
